title: Beautiful and moving
review: I didn't know what to expect entering the cinema, as the trailers did not necessarily promise a good movie, but this film was just perfect. Honestly, I teared up hard a few times, it was just overwhelmingly beautiful cinematographivally, dramatically, and philosophically.

title: After all the hype, I didn't expect it to be that dumb
review: What a silly, campy movie. Bwahahahahah, I can't believe people hated Man of Steel but are praising this crap. Plus, Amber is ugly af
